characters.name: Prophet
characters.description: Sees visions, speaks for God, often emaciated and intense
characters.speech_pattern: Biblical, prophetic, metaphorical, uses archaic language
secrets: Has real visions but misinterprets them

characters.name: Bishop
characters.description: Political clergyman, loves power, ceremony, and wealth
characters.speech_pattern: Formal, uses Latin phrases, carefully measured, paternalistic

characters.name: Inquisitor
characters.description: Seeks heresy everywhere, methodical torturer, true believer
characters.speech_pattern: Precise, legalistic, devoid of emotion, quotes scripture

characters.name: Hermit
characters.description: Lives in wilderness, speaks cryptically, knows ancient secrets
characters.speech_pattern: Cryptic, parable-like, pauses frequently, talks to animals
secrets: Caused the disaster he warns about

characters.name: Nun
characters.description: Devout, practical, runs hospital or school, compassionate but firm
characters.speech_pattern: Gentle but firm, practical, humble, uses medical terms

characters.name: Monk
characters.description: Scholarly, copies manuscripts, brews ale, follows strict routine
characters.speech_pattern: Quiet, measured, quotes texts, knowledgeable about obscure topics

characters.name: Cult Leader
characters.description: Charismatic, offers forbidden knowledge, dangerous charm
characters.speech_pattern: Hypnotic, persuasive, mixes truth with lies, promises secrets

characters.name: Pilgrim
characters.description: Travel-worn, seeks miracle, carries relic, devout but weary
characters.speech_pattern: Tired, repetitive about destination, superstitious, grateful

characters.name: Exorcist
characters.description: Specializes in spiritual cleansing, carries strange tools, intense
characters.speech_pattern: Commanding, uses liturgical Latin, talks to demons, confident

characters.name: Altar Boy
characters.description: Innocent witness, knows church secrets, observant child
characters.speech_pattern: Earnest, respectful, repeats what he's heard, naive questions

characters.name: Church Architect
characters.description: Builds cathedrals, knows hidden passages, obsessed with perfection
characters.speech_pattern: Technical about stone and geometry, reverent about design, proud
secrets: Hid his name in the stonework

characters.name: Relic Forger
characters.description: Creates fake holy objects, knows what people want to believe
characters.speech_pattern: Persuasive, knows religious terminology, quick to justify, secretive
secrets: Sometimes forges for the church itself
Believes in God despite his work
Has real relic he doesn't believe in

characters.name: Veteran Captain
characters.description: Scarred, practical, cares for soldiers, weary of war
characters.speech_pattern: Terse, practical, uses military slang, curses sparingly

characters.name: Ambitious General
characters.description: Wants throne, brilliant tactician, charismatic to troops
characters.speech_pattern: Inspiring to troops, formal to superiors, strategic, confident

characters.name: Mercenary Leader
characters.description: Loyal only to gold, exotic weapons, pragmatic survivor
characters.speech_pattern: Blunt, talks of contracts and pay, accent from elsewhere, no-nonsense
secrets: Has a code of honor he denies

characters.name: Young Knight
characters.description: Idealistic, seeks glory, easily manipulated, honorable
characters.speech_pattern: Earnest, formal, quotes chivalric code, eager
secrets: Secretly in love with wrong person

characters.name: Spymaster
characters.description: Knows everyone's secrets, never writes anything down, paranoid
characters.speech_pattern: Whispered, indirect, answers questions with questions, knows details
secrets: Created threats to justify his position
Lost his own family to spies

characters.name: Deserter
characters.description: Fled battle, knows embarrassing truths, living in shadows
characters.speech_pattern: Nervous, guilty, defensive, jumps at loud noises

characters.name: Army Cook
characters.description: Feeds thousands, hears all gossip, practical and observant
characters.speech_pattern: Bawdy, full of anecdotes, complains about supplies, knowledgeable

characters.name: Standard Bearer
characters.description: Carries flag, symbolically important, brave or terrified
characters.speech_pattern: Proud of his role, talks of flag's history, superstitious
secrets: Can't read the motto on flag

characters.name: Siege Engineer
characters.description: Builds catapults, loves destruction, inventive and slightly mad
characters.speech_pattern: Technical about trajectories and forces, excited by destruction, dismissive of tradition

characters.name: Cavalry Officer
characters.description: Aristocratic, looks down on infantry, loves horses and glory
characters.speech_pattern: Haughty, talks of lineage and horses, impatient with slow thinkers

characters.name: Military Surgeon
characters.description: Blood-stained, pragmatic about death, skilled but overwhelmed
characters.speech_pattern: Tired, clinical, darkly humorous, impatient with whining
secrets: Let noble die to save commoner
Was a barber, not a surgeon

characters.name: Recruiting Sergeant
characters.description: Charismatic liar, fills ranks with promises, cynical
characters.speech_pattern: Boastful, persuasive, full of empty promises, patriotic when needed
secrets: Takes bribes to let men go

characters.name: Scheming Advisor
characters.description: Always whispering, has private agenda, intelligent and manipulative
characters.speech_pattern: Honeyed, indirect, full of flattery and plausible deniability

characters.name: Loyal Chamberlain
characters.description: Runs palace, knows where everything is, fiercely loyal
characters.speech_pattern: Formal, precise, respectful, knows all protocols
secrets: Skims palace funds for good causes
Hates the current king but serves anyway

characters.name: Foreign Ambassador
characters.description: Exotic dress, represents outside power, shrewd negotiator
characters.speech_pattern: Accented, very polite, deliberately ambiguous, observes everything

characters.name: Court Jester
characters.description: Speaks dangerous truths as jokes, survivor, secretly wise
characters.speech_pattern: Rhyming, singing, mocking, uses humor to mask seriousness

characters.name: Royal Poisoner
characters.description: Subtle, knows herbs, denies everything, necessary evil
characters.speech_pattern: Quiet, precise about doses, never admits anything, talks of herbs and cooking
secrets: Has antidotes for his own poisons

characters.name: Master of Revels
characters.description: Organizes parties, knows who's having affairs, cheerful facade
characters.speech_pattern: Bubbly, always planning, name-drops, cheerful even in crisis
motivations: Be the center of social life
secrets: In love with a guest who doesn't know he exists

characters.name: Keeper of the Seal
characters.description: Guardedly formal, ritualistic about documents, wields quiet power
characters.speech_pattern: Extremely formal, quotes law and precedent, slow and deliberate

characters.name: Royal Biographer
characters.description: Records everything, has compromising notes, idealistic or cynical
characters.speech_pattern: Pedantic, detail-oriented, judgmental, loves telling stories

characters.name: Gossip Chronicler
characters.description: Knows all scandals, sells information, survives on wit
characters.speech_pattern: Fast-talking, full of 'they say' and 'I heard', dramatic whispers
secrets: Actually noble, doing this for thrill

characters.name: Elder Statesman
characters.description: Remembers five kings, gives confusing advice, respected but outdated
characters.speech_pattern: Rambling, tells long anecdotes about past, forgets names, profound sometimes
secrets: Caused the mistakes he warns about
Secretly very sharp and pretending to be senile

characters.name: Young Reformer
characters.description: Full of ideas, annoys traditionalists, idealistic and energetic
characters.speech_pattern: Enthusiastic, full of newfangled ideas, impatient with 'but we've always'
secrets: In love with elder statesman's daughter

characters.name: Corrupt Tax Collector
characters.description: Skims off top, knows where wealth is hidden, greedy but charming
characters.speech_pattern: Unctuous, talks of 'fair shares' and 'royal needs', threatening when needed

characters.name: Charismatic Rebel
characters.description: Inspires crowds, has simple solutions, dangerous or righteous
characters.speech_pattern: Passionate, simple, repeating catchphrases, speaks to common experience

characters.name: Grieving Widow
characters.description: Lost everything, seeks justice or revenge, relentless
characters.speech_pattern: Quiet but intense, focused on loss, can become hysterical, factual about wrongs

characters.name: Ambitious Merchant
characters.description: Wants noble title, has ships or caravans, wealth as weapon
characters.speech_pattern: Calculating, talks of investments and opportunities, dismissive of tradition, persuasive

characters.name: Master Craftsman
characters.description: Best at his trade, guild leader, protective of secrets
characters.speech_pattern: Proud of his work, technical about his craft, suspicious of outsiders, values quality

characters.name: Mining Foreman
characters.description: Knows what's underground, leads dangerous work, practical and superstitious
characters.speech_pattern: Gruff, talks of veins and supports, curses the darkness, has tunnel cough

characters.name: Farm Wife
characters.description: Feeds family, knows land intimately, tough and resourceful
characters.speech_pattern: Plain-speaking, uses farming metaphors, complains about weather, knowledgeable about nature
secrets: Had an affair with the lord
Can't have children, these are adopted

characters.name: Village Elder
characters.description: Respected, settles disputes traditional way, memory of community
characters.speech_pattern: Slow, deliberate, tells stories to make points, uses proverbs
secrets: Made terrible decision that doomed village years ago

characters.name: Town Crier
characters.description: Announces news, embellishes for effect, voice of authority
characters.speech_pattern: Loud, formal announcement style, adds his own commentary off-duty
secrets: Hates the sound of his own voice

characters.name: Rat Catcher
characters.description: Sees underground life, knows plague signs, philosophical about death
characters.speech_pattern: Grimly humorous, talks of rats and decay, surprisingly wise, smells bad
motivations: Understand the filth he lives in

characters.name: Midwife
characters.description: Delivers babies, knows family secrets, trusted and powerful
characters.speech_pattern: Calm, reassuring, no-nonsense about bodies, keeps confidences
secrets: Uses herbs for more than childbirth

characters.name: Grave Digger
characters.description: Philosophical about death, finds buried things, essential but shunned
characters.speech_pattern: Slow, deep voice, talks of earth and eternity, dark jokes
motivations: Not be buried in a pauper's grave

characters.name: Beggar King
characters.description: Leads beggars, knows city's underbelly, rules through respect or fear
characters.speech_pattern: Commanding among beggars, whining to alms-givers, shrewd observer
secrets: Can't beg, has others do it for him

characters.name: Alchemist
characters.description: Seeks philosopher's stone, makes explosives, obsessed with transformation
characters.speech_pattern: Rambling, technical about elements and humors, excited about discoveries, cryptic
secrets: Doesn't believe in alchemy, just faking for funding

characters.name: Astronomer
characters.description: Charts stars, predicts events, detached from earthly concerns
characters.speech_pattern: Precise, talks of constellations and movements, dismissive of astrology, patient
secrets: Discovered something terrifying in the stars
Believes stars control fate despite his science

characters.name: Cartographer
characters.description: Maps lands, knows uncharted places, adventurous or armchair traveler
characters.speech_pattern: Descriptive, talks of landmarks and scales, curious about blank spaces on maps
secrets: Found a place he won't put on any map
Works for military, making strategic maps

characters.name: Ship Captain
characters.description: Sailed unknown waters, has exotic goods, weathered and superstitious
characters.speech_pattern: Booming voice, nautical terms, tells tall tales, respects the sea
secrets: Deals in slaves or other illegal cargo

characters.name: Master Builder
characters.description: Constructs castles, knows structural weaknesses, proud of his work
characters.speech_pattern: Practical, talks of load-bearing and materials, proud of his buildings, critical of others' work
motivations: Leave his mark on the skyline
secrets: Used flawed stone in a critical building
Knows secret way into every castle he built
Can't design, only builds others' plans
Hates the nobility he builds for

characters.name: Herbalist
characters.description: Knows healing plants, also poisons, wise woman or witch
characters.speech_pattern: Gentle, knowledgeable about plants, warns of misuse, uses folk names
secrets: Doesn't know the difference between similar plants
All her children died of plague

characters.name: Animal Trainer
characters.description: Handles hunting dogs, hawks, bears, understands animals better than people
characters.speech_pattern: Talks to animals, uses whistles and commands, short with people, patient with beasts

characters.name: Glassblower
characters.description: Creates beautiful things, knows furnace secrets, artist with fire
characters.speech_pattern: Passionate about his craft, talks of heat and color, poetic about glass, protective of techniques
secrets: Stole his techniques from murdered master
Can't make simple things, only art

characters.name: Minstrel
characters.description: Travels widely, sings news as ballads, observer of all classes
characters.speech_pattern: Musical, rhyming, tells stories through song, can mimic accents
secrets: Can't read music, plays by ear
Hates traveling but is addicted to stories

characters.name: Playwright
characters.description: Writes seditious plays, hides messages, clever with words
characters.speech_pattern: Witty, loves wordplay, dramatic in conversation, criticizes everything
secrets: His plays are prophecies he doesn't understand

characters.name: Bookbinder
characters.description: Binds forbidden books, knows hidden compartments, lover of books as objects
characters.speech_pattern: Quiet, precise about leather and stitching, reverent about books, knows clients' secrets
secrets: Reads the forbidden books he binds
Has bound books with human skin
Makes false covers for dangerous books
Can't read, only loves the form

characters.name: Clockmaker
characters.description: Precise, mechanical mind, makes intricate devices, obsessed with time
characters.speech_pattern: Precise, talks of gears and escapements, impatient with inaccuracy, measures time constantly
motivations: Have his clocks in important places
secrets: Can't tell time without his clocks
Built a clock that predicts deaths
